      boolean allFlags()
      this method is been used in gamestate3 and will helps if the game is done or not
      void helpMetods()
      since the room3 is little bit difficult some ways will be drawn every one minutes as help
      void platforms()
      the platform are the place where the player is turning on the lamps the boolean indicate if the player is that place there there is plattforms , if yes the ways will be drawn

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        will draw if the player is settled in a platform which is connected to two or more ways.

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Parameters:
        g - is a graphic object which will draw the wanted object that will be drawn. the boolean will indicate which item is going to be drawn , it takes order from tick

      • platforms

        public void platforms()
        the platform are the place where the player is turning on the lamps the boolean indicate if the player is that place there there is plattforms , if yes the ways will be drawn

      • helpMetods

        public void helpMetods()
        since the room3 is little bit difficult some ways will be drawn every one minutes as help

      • turnOnAll

        public void turnOnAll()
        if its difficult to solve there will be a button that will turn on all the ways/lights,

      • TurnoffAll

        public void TurnoffAll()
        if you want to restart/reset the ways in room3

      • allFlags

        public boolean allFlags()
        this method is been used in gamestate3 and will helps if the game is done or not
        Returns:
        all flags
